clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Hospitalization of Patients in Day and Inpatient Glaucoma Wards in Zhongshan Ophthalmic Center
clinical_study.official_title: Study of Hospitalization of Patients in Day and Inpatient Glaucoma Wards in Zhongshan Ophthalmic Center

lead_sponsor.agency: Zhongshan Ophthalmic Center, Sun Yat-sen University

clinical_study.source: Zhongshan Ophthalmic Center, Sun Yat-sen University

brief_summary.textblock: This study will compare the glaucoma day-ward patients' efficacy with inpatients by evaluating the glaucoma knowledge, psychology, effect of surgery and complications , and will analysis the reasons of the differences. Half of participants will receive treatment in day-ward, while the other half will receive treatment in hospital.

detailed_description.textblock: Ophthalmic surgery has short operative time, quick recovery, and small anesthesia risk, making day case surgery the main management mode of ophthalmic surgery. This study will explore the whole effect of the glaucoma day-ward patients by comparing to the inpatients. The whole effect will be assessed by the following indexes, intraocular pressure, mean defect, complications, psychology, glaucoma knowledge. The metal status will be assessed by The hospital anxiety and depression scale.

primary_outcome.time_frame: at baseline and the first day after operation
primary_outcome.description: The IOP will be measured by Goldmann tonometer

secondary_outcome.measure: Change of depression and anxiety score
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at baseline and 1 hour before discharge
secondary_outcome.description: The depression and anxiety score will be measured by The hospital anxiety and depression scale
Complications include shallow anterior chamber, cataract，endophthalmitis, retina detachment，etc.

other_outcome.time_frame: at baseline and 1 hour before discharge
other_outcome.description: The awareness sore will be measured by Gray Glaucoma Knowledge Questionnaire

intervention.intervention_name: routine treatment, care, education of day-ward
intervention.description: routine treatment, care, centralized education of glaucoma knowledge by nurse after admission
